item.title: What's New on CPAN - Annual Edition
item.description:
Last month I spoke at The Perl Conference in Alexandria, VA. I presented “What’s new on CPAN - annual edition”. Here’s the video of the talk:

The slides are available as a pdf.

I really enjoyed the conference; as much as I liked the talks, my favorite aspect was meeting lots of friendly fellow Perl coders. It really is a lovely community. I’d also like to thank my employer, ZipRecruiter for covering my travel costs for the conference and supporting Open Source.


This article was originally posted on PerlTricks.com.
